name: Boat Boat Boat Boat
description:
Boat Boat Boat Boat is our team's first attempt at online multiplayer during a game jam! In this game, we bring jammers together by dropping you in our ocean world and letting you explore. If you run into another boat, you two will join up into a larger boat and have to work together to control what direction you sail. 

Feel free to join in with your friends, or try to find other players online!

Note: Our map is a little large, so you may need to use the coordinates in the bottom right to find your friends.

Controls:

Hold W or S to determine forward or reverse, then hold A or D to paddle left or right. Alternating will help you move straight.

Tapping A/D/forward/backward will play pirate sounds!
